oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Falstaff Show - Program 01
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Hank Thompson radio show sponsored by Falstaff Beer, program number 1. Featuring Hank Thompson with his Brazos Valley Boys, including Billy Gray and Amos Hendrick.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson; Brazos Valley Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Falstaff jingle (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Opening statement (Hank Thompson) -- How Cold Hearted Can You Get (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Falstaff commercial (Hank Thompson) -- You're Walking On My Heart (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson introduces Billy Gray -- Foggy River (Billy Gray vocals, Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson announces his performance schedule -- Down Home Rag (Amos Hendrick fiddle, Brazos Valley Boys) -- Falstaff commercial (Hank Thompson) -- Teardrops On The Tea Leaves (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Closing statement (Hank Thompson) -- Falstaff jingle (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Closing theme (Boil Them Cabbage Down)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank; Brazos Valley Boys; Gray, Billy, 1924-1975; Hendrick, Amos
